Title: Cladistic analysis of some net-veined Lilliaflorae.
Abstract:
Comparisons between previous intuitive or phenetic
classifications of the netveined Liliiflorae was used to determine a
suitable group of taxa for cladistic analyses. The resultant 48 genera
and generic groupings comprising 19 families from within the
Asparagales, Liliales and Dioscoreales were then analysed. The
cladistics largely supported previous treatments, with the Liliales,
Dioscoreales and Asparagales all monophyletic.
